gw.plugin.search

Class RemotableSearchResultSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.search.RemotableSearchResultSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressBookRemotableSearchResultSpec

    public class RemotableSearchResultSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements GWRemotable
    Specifies search result control parameters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemotableSearchResultSpec() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaxResults()
      Specifies the maximum number of results to return.
      RemotableSortColumn[] getSortColumns()
      Specifies the sort order of the results.
      int getStartRow()
      Specifies the first row to return.
      boolean isGetNumResultsOnly()
      If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results.
      boolean isIncludeTotal()
      Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.
      void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean getNumResultsOnly)
      If set to true, only number of results will be returned, not the results.

      Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.

      Specifies the maximum number of results to return.

        public RemotableSearchResultSpec()

    • Method Detail

      • isGetNumResultsOnly

        public boolean isGetNumResultsOnly()
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • setGetNumResultsOnly

        public void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean getNumResultsOnly)
        If set to true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • getSortColumns

        public RemotableSortColumn[] getSortColumns()
        Specifies the sort order of the results.

        Specifies the sort order of the results.

        Specifies the first row to return.

        public int getMaxResults()
        Specifies the maximum number of results to return.

        Specifies the maximum number of results to return.

      • isIncludeTotal

        public boolean isIncludeTotal()
        Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.

        Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.
